Defines

Logging levels
Defines the level of verbosity of the program. 0 is the less verbose mode (displays fatal errors only).

#define ERR_LOG_LEVEL   5
#define OUT_LOG_LEVEL   5

char  level

Logs debugging messages.

Parameters:
msg the message to log
level the priority level of the message ; maximum priority is 0, and should be used for fatal errors only.
